Commands.Kick: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts 40% splash damage to other targets.
Commands.Kick+: Raises BRV by 1.3 before the attack.  Inflicts 50% splash damage to other targets.
Commands.Focus: Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Kick Attacks: 2-HIT AoE BRV attack.  Lasts for 5 turns after using Focus.
Commands.Kick Recovery: Recovers 1 use of 「Kick」 (up to the initial values)  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Kick Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Kick.
Passives.Focus Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Focus.
Passives.Kick Charge: Increases the max uses of Kick by 1.
Passives.Focus Charge: Increases the max uses of Focus by 1.
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy.
Passives.Fabul's Secret Teachings: Grants a low probability of countering BRV attacks.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Kick Extend: Increases Kick's max uses by 1.When using Kick of Kick+, raises BRV based on Attack first.Increases its number of hits to 2.Tremendously raises its total potency.Slightly raises splash damage dealt with Kick+.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Focus Extend: Increases Focus' max uses by 2.Raises BRV by 50% of Attack.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 5 turns after using Focus.HP Attack+ deals 20% HP damage to other targets.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Kick Recovery Extend: When using  Kick Recovery , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Max BRV for 3 turns

Weapons.Cat Claw CP: 35: Increases the max uses of Focus by 1 and lowers its Action Delay.Raises BRV based on Attack.Increases the potency of Attack Up and Max BRV Up and extends their duration.Turns BRV Attack to Kick Attacks for 5 turns after using Focus.
Weapons.Dragon Claw CP: 15: Increases Kick's potency and raises HP damage inflicted to non-focused targets.
